activities:
Catalina Marketing Corporation may receive a number of different types of data, including the following:

(a) data from its EU based companies to carry out its obligations under employment and benefit laws, to administer employee participation in its benefit, compensation and human resources plans and programs, for performance management and for compliance and discipline reporting and investigation;
(b) data from client customers, including, but not limited to, purchasers of clients' products and/or services, consumer research participants, and consumers interacting with clients' or affiliates' product and/or services promotions;
(c) data related to shareholders of Catalina Marketing Corporation and/or any of its affiliates;
(d) data related to business customers or vendors of Catalina Marketing or any of its affiliates

************************

For issues concerning human resources data please use the organization contact information and corporate officer information provided above.

************************

For issues not concerning human resources data please use the following contact information:

Organization Contact Information: Derek Gilbert, VP & CISO; Tel. 727-563-5734; Email: derek.gilbert@catalinamarketing.com

*****

Corporate Officer: Ira Parker, EVP General Counsel; Tel. 727-579-5092; Email: Ira.Parker@catalinamarketing.com
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Italy, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech:
Catalina Marketing Corporation agrees to cooperate with the EU Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner to investigate all unresolved complaints, regardless of the type of data
involved.
